post.body: I second that one..
thanks! If you're an IR type, it's pretty cool stuff
which URL is bad?
thanks, but as a former reporter I know a slow news day when I see one, that's why I always send out releases on those days :)
thanks, but I actually found everything I needed on Guidestar..
so if you google "whack job" and the name Sarah Palin comes ups first, is that good SEO? :)
I tried both of them and the theater I'm looking for wasn't listed on either one of them..
thanks! that's what I was looking for..
can I ask @albertmaruggi about Sarah Palin, or do I have to have serious questions :)
you can relax now. AT&T is officially the worst company in the world http://tinyurl.com/92owja
Merry Christmas to you! have a wonderful one.. see you next Monday
I so hear that! Heading south now to START wrapping and carolling.. Happy Holidays!
you're very welcome. feel free to tweet or dm me if you have more questions
depends how much MORE snow we get. The good news is that its the lightest, fluffiest stuff. I felt like a kid playing in it
@SandeepVizEdu @planetrussell @chuckhemann @MackCollier, thanks for the RTs!
You know its a slow news day when MSNBC picks up your press release http://tinyurl.com/9rkzmw
feeling a little jealous, though. @shonali is going to susan's house where they serve the best indian food in the world..
spending a wonderful day with family in VT. Watched LIttle Voice, went for a run, truly vegging for 1st time in weeks. merry xmas to me
anyone know how to look up exec salaries for non--profits. trying to get some skinny on a non-profit theater group
